channel.title: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.
channel.description: Hi, so I'm trying to run a nested virtualization (mother VM version 6.1) with a Windows 7 32-bit ran inside a Whonix Workstation (Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.9.4) and after I've created a new machine, the 'OK' to change any settings is grayed out. VM version in the Whonix Workstation is 6.1 as well.

item.title: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Glad it worked for you.

Made some changes to that wiki page:
https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Nested_Virtualization&type=revision&diff=56010&oldid=55043

I can confirm I managed to run a nested VirtualBox VM
(A Whonix-Workstation VM inside a Whonix-Workstation VM - just for testing. Not for serious use.)

Read full topic
item.source: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.

item.title: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.
item.dc:creator: Bartosz
item.description:
Useful response Patrick, glad you took your time to post that.

Issue solved, for anyone having the same issue -

  1. Nested virtualization had to be enabled on the “host” VM - that’s the Enabled Nested VT-x/AMD-V setting on the Processor tab

  2. With an Intel processor, you’ll need to force the setting (on Windows) with opening CMD in the VirtualBox install folder and use
    VBoxManage modifyvm YourVirtualBoxName --nested-hw-virt

Read full topic
item.source: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.

item.title: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
whonix.org – 16 Apr 20

Nested Virtualization - Whonix

It is possible to run Virtual Machines (VMs) inside other VMs. That is called Nested Virtualization.

I suggest to learn nested virtualization without Whonix involved first. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

Read full topic
item.source: Nested virtualization - can't change settings of a new machine inside the Whonix Workstation.
